Welcome to the intEgrated LightKurve (a.k.a. elk) Python package!

This package allows you to download, correct, analyze and visualize integrated light curves from TESS FFI data using the methods outlined in Wainer+2023. While originally designed for analysis of star clusters, it can be used to create integrated light curves for any given aperture.

### InstallationPut simply? `pip install astro-elk`! But we recommend creating a conda environment first to ensure everything goes smoothly! Check out the installation instructions [here](https://elk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/pages/install.html) to learn exactly how to install `elk`### DocumentationAll documentation for `elk` can be found here!### Logo designWe'd also like to acknowledge the absolutely splendid work of Samantha-Lynn Martinez in designing the `elk` logo. You can find more of her portfolio here and we encourage you to reach out to her for any design needs you have!
